channel.title: [pi] Removing the options for the rotten Potato
channel.description: so i followed this tut http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/356528-my-rotten-potato-interface.html and i got some options on the potato that i dont want so how would i remove theam so i just got the option for the interface thanks

item.title: [pi] Removing the options for the rotten Potato
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

It looks right, but you really shouldn’t hard code the definitions. :S

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] Removing the options for the rotten Potato

item.title: [pi] Removing the options for the rotten Potato
item.dc:creator: @BeastChris BeastChris
item.description:
@BeastChris wrote:

so i have this code would this be right

if(i == 5733) { itemdef.modelID = 65268; itemdef.name = "Rotten Potato"; itemdef.description = "The staff item"; itemdef.modelZoom = 980; itemdef.modelRotation1 = 208; itemdef.modelRotation2 = 220; itemdef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemdef.modelOffset2 = -18; itemdef.anInt165 = 65291; itemdef.anInt200 = 65313; itemdef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemdef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemdef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemdef.itemActions[1] = "Interface "; }

not to sure not good whith client sided stuff :[

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] Removing the options for the rotten Potato

item.title: [pi] Removing the options for the rotten Potato
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

BeastChris:

dont have the file i have ItemDef and ItemDef 2 but the options are not there

Add the itemdefinitions of the item in it and change the options. It’ll overwrite the cached one

Read full topic
